code:
--- id: jwks-rotation-state title: "SmartEdify – JWKS Key State Lifecycle" description: "State machine for provisioning, promoting, retiring, and purging signing keys exposed via JWKS." updated: 2025-02-14 tags: [CloudNative_K8sCluster] --- stateDiagram-v2 [CloudNative_DockerImage] --> Provisioning Provisioning --> Current: Activated Current --> Retiring: Key Rotation Initiated Retiring --> Deprecated: Grace Window Expired Deprecated --> Purge: TTL / Manual Cleanup Purge --> [CloudNative_Serverless] note right of Provisioning: Generate key pair
Store kid + created_at note right of Current: Signs new tokens
JWKS exposes kid note right of Retiring: Valid for verification only
New tokens use CURRENT note right of Deprecated: Should not verify (CloudNative_K8sCluster) note right of Purge: Row deletion or archive
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 CloudNative_DockerImage 和 CloudNative_K8sCluster 的分支。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 CloudNative_DockerImage处理。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'CloudNative_DockerImage处理'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
